content: You have made changes in the index. If you proceed without saving, those changes will not be applied.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when the user closes an edit index dialog without saving changes. It warns users that their changes will not be applied. This message appears in a modal dialog footer button.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "փոփոխություններ" (popoxutyuner) is a valid Armenian word but could be slightly improved for clarity in this context.  While technically correct, 'փոփոխությունները' (popoxutyunnerye) might be more natural.
The sentence structure is grammatically correct, but could be slightly more fluid for a native speaker.  Adding a conjunction or slightly restructuring might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence to something like: 'Դուք փոփոխություններ եք կատարել ինդեքսում, բայց եթե շարունակեք առանց պահելու, այդ փոփոխությունները չեն կիրառվի։' (You have made changes in the index, but if you proceed without saving, those changes will not be applied.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຕົວຊີ້ບອກ' (tua chee bok) is a literal translation of 'index' and might be unclear to Lao users. It would be better to use a more descriptive term for 'index' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more descriptive term for 'index' such as 'ບັນຊີລາຍການ' (ban see lai kan - list) or 'ເອກະສານ' (ek ka san - document) depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrase 'ດໍາເນີນການຕໍ່ໄປ' (dam neen kan to pai) is a bit formal and lengthy. It can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ດໍາເນີນການຕໍ່ໄປ' with 'ຕໍ່ໄປ' (to pai - proceed) for a more natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "will not be applied" is a somewhat awkward translation of "will not be applied." A more natural phrasing in Latvian would be something closer to 'tiks zaudētas' (will be lost) or 'nebūs saglabātas' (will not be saved).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jūs esat veicis izmaiņas indeksā. Ja turpināsiet bez saglabāšanas, šīs izmaiņas tiks zaudētas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'efectuou' is a misspelling of 'efetuou'.

The Romanian translation 'Dvs ați operat modificări în indexul. Dacă continuați fără salvare, modificările dvs nu vor fi validate.' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of the English sentence 'You have made changes in the index. If you proceed without saving, those changes will not be applied.'  'Validate' implies a formal approval process which isn't present in the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dvs ați făcut modificări în index. Dacă continuați fără a salva, aceste modificări nu vor fi aplicate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Dvs' is somewhat formal and may not be the most natural way to address the user. It's better to use the informal 'Tu' or the more neutral 'Dumneavoastră' depending on the desired tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tu ai făcut modificări în index. Sau: Dumneavoastră ați făcut modificări în index.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'salvare' is technically correct, 'a salva' would flow better and more naturally in this context.

The translation 'ඔබ දර්ශකයේ වෙනස්කම් කර ඇත. සුරක්ෂිත නොකර ඉදිරියට යාමෙන්, එම වෙනස්කම් ක්‍රියාත්මක නොවනු ඇත.' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Sinhala. The phrase 'දර්ශකයේ වෙනස්කම් කර ඇත' (changes in the index) is somewhat awkward.  A more natural phrasing would describe the user's work.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ දර්ශකයේ සිදු කළ වෙනස්කම් සුරක්ෂිත කරන්නේ නම්, ඒවා නැති වී යන.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ක්‍රියාත්මක නොවනු ඇත' (will not be implemented/executed) is too technical and formal for this context. It's better to use simpler language.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ කරන වෙනස්කම් සුරක්ෂිත කරන්නේ නම්, ඒවා නැති වී යන.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'чувања' should be 'сачувања'. 'Чувати' means 'to guard', while 'сачувати' means 'to save'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Направили сте измене у индексу. Ако наставите без сачувања, те измене неће бити примењене.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Napravili' is slightly informal. While not strictly incorrect, a more formal alternative like 'Učinili' might be more suitable for a software context.

The translation '您已更改索引。如果继续操作而不保存，则不会应用这些更改。' is accurate in conveying the meaning but reads a bit formal and stiff for a user-facing message.  '继续操作' is a very direct translation of 'proceed', and more natural phrasing might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您已更改索引。如果继续，将不会保存这些更改。
